description:
Misaki fights her last match in the Tokyo Regional Qualifiers. Both Misaki and her opponent discover the fun of playing Angelic Layer, even while competing. The Angels advancing to the Kanto Games are announced.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Auf Messers Schneide - Misakis letzte Chance
Fight to the Limit... Misaki`s Last Chance
Giri-giri no Tatakai... Misaki no Last Chance
Lutando No Limite...! Última Chance De Misaki!
Un combat difficile ! La dernière chance de Misaki.
ギリギリの戦い... みさきのラストチャンス
